photo.capture: A little opera helps them grow!

fun_moment.text: When a Venus Flytrap grabbed Clott’s stack of Dirt Doughnuts out of his hands!

about.fun_fact: She keeps gardening tools inside her big flower hat
about.text: This nature-loving Bin Weevil just adores the outdoors. She loves everything that grows: trees, flowers, vines, grass – even moss! Garden Inspector firmly believes that plants need to be sung to, and she’s always learning new tunes in her garden.
